text: 2. Using the recurrence, draw a recursion tree for QuickSort. Label each node by the number of elements in the array at that nodeâ€™s call (the root is labeled n) and the amount of time taken by that node but not its children. Also, label the total work (time) for each "level" of calls. Show the root at level 0 and the next two levels below the root, and also the node at the leftmost and rightmost branches of level i.
